title: Personalized Science Learning Design to Improve Prior Knowledge and Academic Achievement

context.prior_knowledge: Core Scientific Concepts and Experimental Methodologies
context.additional_context: Instructional competency enhancement program for pre-service/in-service teachers. Science education course that diagnoses learners' prior knowledge (declarative/procedural) and provides customized learning activities. Focuses on addressing individual weaknesses and improving academic achievement through real-time interactions

learning_goals: Learners can measure their declarative and procedural knowledge levels through prior knowledge assessment tools
Learners can improve academic achievement in science fields by at least 20% through personalized learning activities
Learners can self-diagnose and address individual knowledge gaps using feedback systems
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
